net.openhft.saxophone.json.handler

Interface JsonHandlerBase

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArrayEndHandler, ArrayStartHandler, BooleanHandler, FloatingHandler, IntegerHandler, NullHandler, NumberHandler, ObjectEndHandler, ObjectKeyHandler, ObjectStartHandler, ResetHook, StringValueHandler

    public interface JsonHandlerBase
    Common root of per-element handlers, without methods though.

    Currently the only purpose of this interface - compile-time check of the adapter in JsonParserBuilder.applyAdapter(JsonHandlerBase) method.
